text: William Troy Bolling (born June 15, 1957) is an American businessman, politician and educator. He was the 39th Lieutenant Governor of Virginia. He is a Republican. ==References== Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:Educators from Virginia Category:Lieutenant Governors of Virginia Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Politicians from West Virginia Category:Businesspeople from West Virginia Category:Businesspeople from Virginia Category:Educators from West Virginia
title: Bill Bolling
